Reviews.Title: Great product and satisfy what you want
Reviews.Author: damanjeetsingh
Reviews.Content: Well first of all I really liked this product love it like I got ever think I wanted . Amazon said  it will be delivered by 26 th of dec but I received this little cute item in 3 days that from England by Royal Mail fast delivery thanks for that. Then when I open it small little item looks great charge for 2 hours then I put h2o wireless SIM card in that works great with this network.did exactly what direction told me to do put the SIM card in it red light blinks for 3 seconds and then gone then I play videos on you tube n put the item nearby. Went far around 2 miles from home n called the number that has been activated with this item. I m shocked n surprise that I can listen ever think from that far u can call from any number n u can listen very clearly what other person is talking or anythink u want to do .really great thanks to laymen CBS that they made this product .hope they will sell more of this because I m ordering one more as soon I m getting my paycheck.

Reviews.Title: best ive ever sean
Reviews.Author: michael joslin
Reviews.Content: product works great who ever wrote a bad review on this dont know what they are talking about .this bug works good  just activate your sim in a phone take it out put it in  your bug and there it is

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: js
Reviews.Content: You have to have a phone to activate the SIM card then put the SIM card in the layden.  I used tMobile with no problem. Very small but really picks up the sound.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't Work.
Reviews.Author: edgar239
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these on a different site, and it didn't work. I did some research on this product a found that the item can't work in U.S. Because of various frequency related issues. These are being mass produced in China by various "Mom and Pop" factories. As far as all the rave reviews by others on this item, well. The other reviewers English, on this items, reads like the manuals that come with products being produced in China, and translated AWFULLY.

Reviews.Title: Want money back
Reviews.Author: coboblack
Reviews.Content: Worst product ever and even worse support. I went to verizon and AT&T; go try and get this to work and both companies said it was impossible to get a SIM card to work without an imeiAnd I can't get ahold of the company that makes it to troubleshoot

Reviews.Title: Bad Sound Quality
Reviews.Author: Black Shango
Reviews.Content: This is a great idea and I love the idea. It works exactly as described. I can either call the SIM number and listen in or send the sound activation code and it calls me. Then after I hang up it sends a text message with location coordinates. Unfortunately the sound quality is so bad that nothing can be understood. I can hear people talking but the sound is too distorted to derive anything intelligent out of it. To me that makes the device completely useless.

Reviews.Title: I love the James Bond in it.
Reviews.Author: Abdul Abdullahi Tafarki Argungu
Reviews.Content: It's absolutely worth the buy,the clarity and secrecy is superb most important the portability and simplicity is worth the Money expended.

Reviews.Title: It works great! I recommend it to anyone who want to feel yourself as a spy)))
Reviews.Author: glazun
Reviews.Content: This device is great idea in real for great price!!! I was looking some bugs and discovered this as a perfect tool to use. It's good to expose somebody or get some information which was hided from you.

Reviews.Title: No review at this time
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: I have not figured out how to use this yet... I've tried different SIM cards even paid for new service to activate with a phone number but its still hasn't worked... I'm going to call and have them explain it to me before I summit a review

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: chey garrigan
Reviews.Content: Very small and surprised at how great it works.  Exceeded all my expectation. Yes I would recommend this product to everyone.

Reviews.Title: A wonderful product, highly recommend.
Reviews.Author: Ernie Moreau
Reviews.Content: I just love new technology and gave this product a try . I tried it the first time and loved it.And works as mentioned, Great work.

ProductInfo.Features:
The LAYEN CSB is the perfect audio surveillance device. It's tiny and discreet making it easy to conceal.  Despite its' small size, it's a high quality device, providing clear sound quality, long standby duration (around 2 days) and 1-2 hours constant use (extendable with a portable power-bank).
The device works via a Mobile Pre-Pay GSM SIM card (the older large style). Simply insert a Pay As You Go / Pre-Pay GSM SIM into the device and call it to turn the device on and start listening. Not only will you be able to hear through walls and doors, but you can literally dial in from anywhere in the country or world!
Call to listen OR set Voice Activation: when there is a sound above 45db within 10 metres of the device, you will be called to listen.
** IMPORTANT PLEASE READ ** The LAYEN CSB requires a GSM network (not CDMA) and runs off four GSM frequencies: 850/900/1800/1900 MHz. It works exactly like a mobile with service/ reception etc. It will not work if the SIM card requires an IMEI number to activate it, as the CSB does NOT have an IMEI number to enable this.
Brand New. Please Ignore Amazon's Estimated Delivery Times (both before and after purchase) LAYEN dispatches all orders within 24 hours. Delivery approx. 7-10 days.
ProductInfo.Name: LAYEN CSB - Home Security Audio Surveillance. SIM Activated and Discreet With Crystal Clear Sound and Voice Activation Feature
